output: The Plum Gator 7 is a smartphone with a 5.7-inch IPS LCD display and a resolution of 720 x 1440 pixels. It features an 8MP main camera for capturing high-quality photos and videos, while its 5MP front-facing camera allows for clear selfies. The device runs on Android 11 with a MediaTek MT6761V chipset and offers 3GB of RAM. The Plum Gator 7 has a Li-Po battery of 5580 mAh and supports Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, GPS, NFC, FM radio, and USB connectivity.

The Chea 218 is a GSM mobile phone with a compact design measuring 85 x 45 x 20 mm and weighing 74 grams. It features a TFT display with 65K colors and a resolution of 128 x 160 pixels, along with a second external FSTN monochrome display for additional information. The phone offers basic messaging capabilities including SMS and MMS, as well as support for WAP 1.2.1 browser. It has a removable Li-Ion battery that provides up to 2 hours of talk time and up to 200 hours of standby.

The Wiko T10 is a smartphone with a 6.5-inch IPS LCD display and a resolution of 720 x 1600 pixels. It features a 13MP main camera for capturing high-quality photos and videos, while also offering a 5MP front-facing camera. The device runs on Android 11 (Go edition) with a MediaTek MT6761 Helio A22 chipset and 2GB of RAM. The Wiko T10 has a Li-Ion battery of 5000mAh, providing long-lasting usage.

The Vodafone Tab Prime 7 is a 10.1-inch tablet with an IPS LCD display and a resolution of 1200x1920 pixels. It features a Qualcomm Snapdragon 430 chipset and 2GB RAM for smooth performance. The device has a 5MP main camera and supports video recording, while also offering a 2MP front-facing camera. The Tab Prime 7 comes with a Li-Po battery of 5830mAh capacity.

The Parla Sonic 3.5S is a mobile phone with a 3.5-inch TFT display and a resolution of 320 x 480 pixels. It features a 2MP camera for capturing photos and videos. The device runs on Android 4.4 (KitKat) and has a Spreadtrum 7715 chipset, along with 256MB RAM. The phone offers Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and FM radio functionality. It is powered by a Li-Ion battery of 1300 mAh.

The INNO 30 is a GSM mobile phone with a TFT display and a resolution of 128 x 160 pixels. It features a VGA camera for capturing photos and video recording capabilities. The phone has a removable Li-Ion battery that offers up to 3 hours of talk time. It also supports SMS, MMS, and email messaging along with basic internet browsing using WAP. The INNO 30 is discontinued.

The Mitac MIO Leap K1 is a 2.6-inch TFT resistive touchscreen phone with a 240x320 pixel resolution display and a 4:3 aspect ratio. It features a 2MP camera with an LED flash for capturing photos and video recording capabilities. The device runs on Windows Mobile 6.1 Professional and has a 64MB RAM, 1GB internal storage, and supports Bluetooth 2.0 with A2DP connectivity. It is powered by a removable Li-Ion battery that offers up to 5 hours of talk time.
